title: Create a list of races that are tied or in single digits with a link to their actblue donations page
selftext:
Sources: 538 (with a rating of B- and up), RealclearPolitics, Ballotpedia, [270toWin.com](https://270toWin.com)

Senate  Alaska - Dr. Alan Gross  

[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/algross](https://secure.actblue.com/donate/algross)

[https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jon-ossoff-1](https://secure.actblue.com/donate/jon-ossoff-1)
